div.div: Wittenberg Univ. vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Wittenberg wins the toss, defers to the second half
Will Gingery kickoff 63 yards to the WOO2, Tyler Smith return 10 yards to the WOO12 (Caden Leichty;Timmy James).
Sean Hackel rush for 3 yards to the WOO15 (Evan Killilea).
Richard Barnes pass incomplete to Keir Pace, dropped pass.
Richard Barnes rush for 1 yard to the WOO16 (Dustin Holmes;Evan Killilea).
Tyler Gerwig punt 29 yards to the WOO45, downed.
